title: Battery problem
content:
I have pixel 3XL. When I unplug it from charging it shows me low battery. Like I can have full battery and it is running out in seconds. But only on the screen. It keeps battery normally, but always shows me 1%. I can work a whole day with my phone. But it is always shows me 1%. Ila d I never know when is a real low battery. 
Did someone have something similar a d how to fix it?
Greetings
J
